Want to look sexy at work?  but wearing a box shirt sucks.  buy this top and let the muscles pop.  try a size smaller if you really want to show off.

Material is comfortable and repels liquids.  Both of which are important in the healthcare industry.  The stretchy material in the shoulders is fantastic.  If you want a more slim fit/athletic fit I would size down.  I usually wear size M (slim build with slightly broad shoulders).  I opted for a size S for this particular scrub top.  Its a slim fit, the stretchy material on the shoulders and upper back make a size S comfortable.  Otherwise, it would be really tight in the shoulders w/o it.  Looking forward to purchasing more in different colors.

评论概述: Not as expected but still a Cherokee product
评论详情: Style, color, and fabric are excellent. Great match for Cherokee's jogger scrub bottoms. Unlike other Cherokee tops I own, this one is very tight across the shoulders in my usual L size. If I were to order this again I would order a XL.

评论概述: Don't buy, wrinkles and more wrinkles.
评论详情: Honestly these scrubs are the worst I ever owned in 13 years of wearing scrubs.  Prior lines of Cherokee have been great.  I went with these because they are advertised as stretching and easy care.  Couldn't be further from the truth.  These things wrinkle so bad coming out of the dryer no matter what setting you use.  And they also attract lint like nobody's business.  I spend 30+ minutes trying to iron them after spending just as long getting all the lint off.  No more Cherokee for me.  These also fit very baggy so suggest getting next size down should you choose to purchase.

评论概述: Great quality and material, but runs small

Very comfortable. If you’re on the edge about which size to get, size up.

I found that the shirt fit my chest and waist really well and doesn’t bunch up on my arms much which is something I’m used to from last scrub tops. The only thing I wish were different was more a closed collar, the back of the collar is rounded off kinda low instead of sitting right on my neck. Nonetheless, I am pleased with the material, the functionality, and the style of this scrub top. Oh, and it’s not long like other scrub tops, long enough let you behind over without exposing your back but not too long that it looks like a dress, which I again have experienced in the past with other tops.
